src:
Jadwal Liga Italia Pekan Ke-11, Klasemen, dan Top Skor
01 Nov 2019, 09:08 by Terjemahan, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jadwal Serie A Liga Italia pekan ke-11 akan bergulir akhir minggu ini. Persaingan Juventus dan Inter Milan kembali berlangsung menarik.
Juventus, yang merupakan juara bertahan, saat ini memuncaki klasemen dengan nilai 26. Mereka hanya unggul satu poin dari Inter di urutan kedua.
Pada pekan ke-11 ini, Juve akan berlaga di kandang Torino, tim penghuni urutan ke-13 klasemen. Sedangkan Inter akan menyambangi markas Bologna, yang ada di urutan ke-11.
AC Milan, yang masih terpuruk di urutan ke-10, akan berusaha mempertahankan kebangkitan setelah menang 1-0 atas SPAL. Mereka akan menjamu Lazio, yang tampil cukup mengesankan di musim ini dan kini ada di posisi kelima.
Jadwal Liga Italia pekan ke-11
Sabtu, 02 November 2019AS Roma vs Napoli | 21:00 WIB
Ahad, 03 November 2019Bologna vs Inter Milan | 00:00 WIBTorino vs Juventus | 02:45 WIBAtalanta vs Cagliari | 18:30 WIBGenoa vs Udinese | 21:00 WIBVerona vs Brescia | 21:00 WIBLecce vs Sassuolo | 21:00 WIB
Senin, 04 November 2019Fiorentina vs Parma | 00:00 WIBAC Milan vs Lazio | 02:45 WIB
Selasa, 05 November 2019SPAL vs Sampdoria | 02:45 WIB.
Top Skor Liga Italia12 gol: Ciro Immobile (Lazio)8 gol: Luis Muriel (Atalanta) 7 gol: Romelu Lukaku (Inter Milan) 6 gol: Duvan Zapata (Atalanta), Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) 5 gol: Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus), Andrea Belotti (Torino), M Mancosu (Lecce), Edin Dzeko (AS Roma), C Koume (Genoa), Lauturo Marinez (Inter), Joao Pedro (Cagliari). 4 gol: Dries Mertens (Napoli), Alfredo Donnarumma (Brescia), A Gomez (Atalanta), A Cornelius (Parma), Alaksander Kolarov (AS Roma).

text:
Week 11 of the Italian League Schedule, Standings and Top Scores
Nov 01 2019, 09:08 by translations, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Week 11 of the Serie A Italian League schedule will roll this weekend. The rivalry between Juventus and Inter Milan is again interesting.
Juventus, who are the defending champions, currently top the standings with a value of 26. They are only one point ahead of Inter in second.
In this 11th week, Juve will compete at home to Torino, the 13th team in the standings. While Inter will visit Bologna headquarters, which is ranked 11th.
AC Milan, who are still in 10th place, will try to maintain a resurgence after a 1-0 win over SPAL. They will host Lazio, who appear quite impressive this season and are now in fifth place.
Italian league fixtures week 11
Saturday, November 2 2019 AS Roma vs Napoli | 21:00 WIB
Sunday, November 3, 2019Bologna vs Inter Milan | 00:00 WIBTorino vs Juventus | 02:45 WIBAtalanta vs Cagliari | 18:30 WIB Geneva vs Udinese | 21:00 WIBVerona vs Brescia | 21:00 WIB Lecce vs Sassuolo | 21:00 WIB
Monday, November 4, 2019 Fiorentina vs Parma | 00:00 WIBAC Milan vs Lazio | 02:45 WIB
Tuesday, November 5 2019SPAL vs Sampdoria | 02:45 WIB.
Top Scores for Italian League12 goals: Ciro Immobile (Lazio) 8 goals: Luis Muriel (Atalanta) 7 goals: Romelu Lukaku (Inter Milan) 6 goals: Duvan Zapata (Atalanta), Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) 5 goals: Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) , Andrea Belotti (Torino), M Mancosu (Lecce), Edin Dzeko (AS Roma), C Koume (Genoa), Lauturo Marinez (Inter), Joao Pedro (Cagliari). 4 goals: Dries Mertens (Napoli), Alfredo Donnarumma (Brescia), A Gomez (Atalanta), A Cornelius (Parma), Alaksander Kolarov (AS Roma).
